technologies.name: Froala Editor
technologies.description: Froala Editor is a WYSIWYG HTML Editor written in Javascript that enables rich text editing capabilities for applications.

technologies.name: Chart.js
technologies.description: Chart.js is an open-source JavaScript library that allows you to draw different types of charts by using the HTML5 canvas element.

technologies.name: Microsoft ASP.NET
technologies.description: ASP.NET is an open-source, server-side web-application framework designed for web development to produce dynamic web pages.

technologies.name: Kendo UI
technologies.description: Kendo UI is a HTML5 user interface framework for building interactive and high-performance websites and applications.

technologies.name: Font Awesome
technologies.description: Font Awesome is a font and icon toolkit based on CSS and Less.

technologies.name: Swiper
technologies.description: Swiper is a JavaScript library that creates modern touch sliders with hardware-accelerated transitions.

technologies.name: reCAPTCHA
technologies.description: reCAPTCHA is a free service from Google that helps protect websites from spam and abuse.

technologies.name: jQuery
technologies.description: jQuery is a JavaScript library which is a free, open-source software designed to simplify HTML DOM tree traversal and manipulation, as well as event handling, CSS animation, and Ajax.

technologies.name: crypto-js
technologies.description: crypto-js is a JavaScript library of crypto standards.

technologies.name: Open Graph
technologies.description: Open Graph is a protocol that is used to integrate any web page into the social graph.
